front.title: Distribute SRv6 Locator by IPv6 Stateless Address Autoconfiguration

abstract.t: In an SRv6 network, each SRv6 Segment Endpoint Node must be assigned an SRv6 locator, and segment IDs are generated within the address space of this SRv6 locator. This document describes a method for assigning SRv6 locators to SRv6 Segment Endpoint Nodes through IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration.
